value.title: Introduction to Copilot for Microsoft 365
value.content: Copilot for Microsoft 365 provides AI assistance to boost productivity and efficiency across various Microsoft 365 apps. It helps users with tasks such as summarizing emails, generating content, and managing data.
value.author: admin

value.title: Getting Started with Copilot for Microsoft 365
value.content: Learn how to set up and start using Copilot for Microsoft 365. This guide covers the initial setup, basic functionalities, and tips for getting the most out of Copilot.
